entry.title: Can I use custom view entity as Value Help?
entry.content:
Title. I have created a custom view entity which selects from custom table. I'm trying to use it as value help on a specific custom field. However, the value help couldn't be found when selecting for value helps.

I have added the annotations but still no success:

@search.searchable: true
@ObjectModel.dataCategory: #VALUE_HELP
@ObjectModel.usageType: {
serviceQuality: #X
sizeCategory: #S
dataClass: #MIXED
}

entry.title: ü§¨ SAP Public Cloud: It's not a Bug, it's a feature not yet localized
entry.content:
Recently, SAP Support has started using a new phrase... "It's not a Bug, it's a feature not yet localized for xxx Country"

2 different instances that I faced recently:

  • RAP BO: I_BILLINGDOCUMENTTP Action CreateFromExternalData
    • Issue: Dump happens during Save phase
    • Reason: For Brazil, there are some mandatory field checks coded within the Billing Document Save that throws Messages, which RAP engine doesn't like, and thus results in a BEHAVIOR_ILLEGAL_STATEMENT dump.
    • Response: ......The localization of the 1Z6 scope item was carried out using the API with SOAP, and this process does not involve the I_BillingDocumentTP Business Object.....
  • RAP BO: I_PURCHASEORDERTP_2 Action Create
    • Issue: Delivery Address passed in the RAP BO by calling program, isn't considered for Tax calculation
    • Reason: The bug is identified in Class CL_TXS_FM_ADDRESS, method GET_ADDRESS_COMPLETE. The class is passing both address number & address handle to the function module ADDR_GET_COMPLETE, and this results in a Parameter_error Exception. The exception is happening because both parameters contain value. If address handle is populated, then only address handle must be passed to the function. If address handle is not populated, only then pass the address number. This requires a simple fix. A simple IF condition before the Function module call will avoid the Parameter_Error exception.
    • Response: ....However, since you are using a Z class for the creation of the Purchase Order, we cannot guarantee that the process will work properly, as the document creation flow is different. This also happens when using some Fiori Apps, such as Manage Purchase Order, for example....... I would like to emphasize that this is not a SAP bug, but rather a scenario that is not localized for Brazil, since in these contexts we are directly consuming an MM Core logic. If you use the localized VH Create Purchase Order - Advanced (ME21N), you won't face any issues.......

It is incredibly painful to get together enough people to vote on a request for a new API on Influence portal, since everyone who are working with Public Cloud, may not face the same requirement at the same exact time. And, until they face the issue, they may not bother to come to Influence portal and search for the request and vote on it. Even if we do all that, and gather enough votes and gather SAP's attention to put in a development request for the API, what I hear now is released APIs are still not to be trusted, because they may not be localized for a specific country or a specific scenario and it takes another Influence ticket in Localization Influence Portal, and the same chain of processes, for it to become useful.

What does released API even mean? Where on API hub is the documentation/list of localized APIs?

entry.title: Unable to extend standard Fiori app
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I‚Äôm working on the standard SAP Fiori app F1643A ‚Äì on SAP S/4HANA 2023 (on-premise S03).
Documentation: https://fioriappslibrary.hana.ondemand.com/sap/fix/externalViewer/#/detail/Apps('F1643A')/S30OP 

The requirement is to display some custom fields that were generated and are already available in the classic ME51N transaction.

However, in the app documentation link above, I couldn‚Äôt find the ‚ÄúExtension‚Äù tab, does that mean that the app cannot be extended ? or is there another way to enable those fields in this app?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: Replacement of string '&3' not possible in CDS View
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

While creating a CDS View for outputting text elements, I stumbled upon an interesting behavior. To put it simply, I have the following string from an SAP text element:

'The limit for customer &1 was exceeded by &2 &3 at &4'

I apply the replace function four times to replace the string &1, &2, &3 and &4 with the following values:

value1 = '123456'
value2 = '100.00'
value3 = 'EUR'
value4 = '13.10.2015'
cast(replace
  (cast(replace
    (cast(replace
      (cast(replace(Text, '&1', cast(value1 as abap.char(20))) as abap.char(76)), 
    '&2', cast(value2 as abap.char(20))) as abap.char(76)), 
  '&3', cast(value3 as abap.char(20))) as abap.char(76)),
'&4', cast(value4 as abap.char(20))) as abap.char(76)) as MessageText

This logic works fine for &1, &2 and &4, while &3 is simply not replaced, regardless of the target value that is inserted. This results in the following string:

'The limit for customer 123456 was exceeded by 100.00 &3 at 13.10.2025'

Has anyone else encountered this error, or is there a better way to output text elements in CDS?

Note: I am on ABAP Version 7.58.

Thanks in advance!

BR,
Lukas

entry.content:
Is it possible to set the behavior of a custom field in CJ20N if a certain logic is met?Like set it as read-only.

I'm looking at screen 600 and 700 of program SAPLXCN1.

entry.title: Value Help as dropdown, not F4 in Custom Fields - Code List
entry.content:
Hello, 

the topic is about implementing a Custom Field via KeyUser Extensions. 

I was wondering is there anyway to change the standard behavior of displaying the Value Help for the Custom Field based on Code List. The default scenario is the Value Help opens up:

My question is - can it be changed to the dropdown list (Like in the Status field in screenshot)? In the documentation I see that it should be automatically be done as Dropdown when the data set is small - I have only 7 values. But it appears as a F4 Value Help. 

Of course I can create a CDS based Code List - and then manually set the @ObjectModel.resultSet.sizeCategory: #XS. But in the regular Code List you cannot edit ABAP files. And for e.g. for Custom Fields with 3-4 values I don't want to have to create an additional table, text table for translations, value help CDS, and then the Custom Fields. 

Any solutions to that?

entry.title: Generate PDF form on S/4HANA Cloud, public edition from BTP app
entry.content:
I‚Äôm building a BTP CAP application which should retrieve the PDF printout of an Outbound Delivery (FDP_V2_DELIVERY_NOTE_V1 template )out of an S/4HANA Cloud, public edition system.

Since no direct API exists (like for billing documents Overview | Billing Document - Read, Cancel, GetPDF | SAP Business Accelerator Hub), as per my understanding I‚Äôm left with three options:

  1. Recreate the same form I have on S/4HANA on BTP with SAP Forms Service by Adobe
  2. Get the PDF directly from CA_OC_OUTPUT_REQUEST_SRV Service
  3. Create a small custom ABAP service to be called from BTP which, given a specific delivery number, could return a PDF

I tried all those routes, but couldn‚Äôt succeed for various reasons:

  1. SAP Forms Service by Adobe
    1. it seems I can‚Äôt reuse the layout I made since the service only accept only one file, whereas mine is comprised of a master form and a content for
    2. even if I could recreate it from scratch I don't know how I can get data out of the standard Data Provider (FDP_V2_DELIV_NOTE_LO_GLO_GEN_SRV) to pass it to the layout
  2. this does not seem to be a released API, therefore I think I could have a problem with Communication Arrangement technical user
  3. on Premise FM like ‚ÄòFP_JOB_OPEN‚Äô etc.. are obviously forbidden, so I tried with proper classes like cl_fp_form_reader like suggested in Note 3355397 - No support for custom form templates in S/4 HANA Cloud Developer Extensibility - SAP for Me, however,  since the form was created using Maintain Form Template App, I tried to create in ADT, but no standard Data Provider can be chosen and I can‚Äôt even create my own copy with the proper annotations (as explained in note 3650179 - [2508] Cannot select data provider in ADT Form dialog - SAP for Me) because I can‚Äôt open SEGW on a Public Cloud environment.

I‚Äôve hit a dead end. Can someone share a tip?

entry.title: Pass an xml via post request for SAP Gateway project
entry.content:
Hi All,

I created a gateway project to consume a RFC function module ( which has an import param (string) and export Param String). In the "/IWBEP/IF_MGW_APPL_SRV_RUNTIME~CREATE_DEEP_ENTITY" , I have written the code to call the RFC FM. Inside the FM , we have CALL TRANSFORMATION  to Transform XML to internal tables .

various validations are done and the xml is built n passed  to the export parameter.

This works when i execute the Fm via se37.

However when I call it via gateway I am struggling. How do I use the xml as post request?

entry.title: I am getting a blank page when I preview my RAP service binding in the BTP trial account.
entry.content:
TITLE:
UCON 403 Forbidden Error - "The request has been blocked by UCON" on OData Service

DESCRIPTION:
I am experiencing a 403 Forbidden error when trying to access an OData service through a Fiori application. The error message in the browser console states:

"The request has been blocked by UCON."

DETAILS:
- Error Code: 403 Forbidden
- Error Message: "The request has been blocked by UCON"
- Application URL: https://[your-system-url]/sap/bc/adt/businessservices/odatav2/feap/[service-details]/flp.html
- SAP Client: 100
- Language: EN
- Resource Endpoint: /sap/opu/odata/sap/Z[service-name]

ERROR DETAILS FROM BROWSER CONSOLE:
Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 403 (Forbidden)
/sap/opu/odata/sap/Z‚Ä¶e&sap-language=EN:1

 

I am trying to display a list view by creating an entity on this service definition, and I have also created a service binding for it. 

@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'demo'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity Zsam_demo as select from /dmo/connection
{
@UI.lineItem: [{ position: 10 ,label: 'CarrierId' }]
    key carrier_id as CarrierId,
@UI.lineItem: [{ position: 20 ,label: 'ConnectionId' }]
    key connection_id as ConnectionId,
    @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 30 ,label: 'AirportFromId' }]
    airport_from_id as AirportFromId,
    @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 40 ,label: 'AirportToId' }]
    airport_to_id as AirportToId,
    @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 50 ,label: 'DepartureTime' }]
    departure_time as DepartureTime, 
    @ui.lineItem: [{ position: 60 ,label: 'ArrivalTime' }]
    arrival_time as ArrivalTime
}
@EndUserText.label: 'demo'
define service Zssd_sam_demo {
  expose Zsam_demo;
}

 

Please let me know anyone know to how resolve the issue 

I tried everything ‚Äî I even deleted my BTP instance and created a new one, but I‚Äôm still facing the same issue.

entry.title: How to Add a New Tab in ESS Portal for Time Event (Punch In/Out)
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I am working on Employee Self-Service (ESS) in SAP Portal and I want to add a new tab in the ESS overview for Time Event, where employees can view and record Punch In / Punch Out times.

Here‚Äôs what I have done so far:

  1. Created a Web Dynpro ABAP Component (Z_HRESS_TIME_EVENT) with:

    • From Date / To Date input

    • Punch In / Punch Out buttons

    • Table showing history of time events

  2. Exposed it as a Web Dynpro Application (Z_HRESS_TIME_EVENT_APP) in SE80, which runs perfectly when tested directly.

  3. In LPD_CUST, I created a new folder under the same Role / Instance as other tabs (Working Time, Personal Information, Benefits) and added my application there.

Problem / Question:

When I log in to the ESS Portal, I do not see my new tab. I understand that the Portal shows tabs via iViews and role assignments.

I want to know:

  • How can I create an iView for my Web Dynpro application and assign it to the ESS Role / Workset in the Portal?

  • Can this be done without Portal Admin access, or do I need someone with admin rights?

  • Are there best practices for adding Time Event tabs in ESS overview for punch in/out functionality?

Any guidance, example steps, or references would be very helpful!

Thanks in advance.

#SAP #ABAP #WebDynpro #ESS #SAPPortal #EmployeeSelfService #LPD_CUST #FPM

entry.title: Need to extend F3893 Sales Order Manage V2 fiori App to stop the order saving(Simulate order data)
entry.content:
I have extended the F3893 app to add a custom button to stop the sales order saving from F3893-Manage Sales Order V2. My requirement is to extend this app to simulate all order data but without saving or creating the order. In back end it has RAP model with CDS C_SALESORDERMANAGER_SD service. Implemented the BADI SD_SLS_CHECK_BEFORE_SAVE~CHECK_DOCUMENT to stop the sales order save by adding a message type E to MESSAGES, now its stopping the Save order or order creation. But this same BADI is triggering for standard F3893 app also. due to this unable to create sales orders from standard F3893 app. I want to stop the sales order creation from my custom extended app only with custom button action after giving the Order data and Item data without affecting to SAP standard app F3893. 

Can you please suggest how can i achieve this requirement.

Thank you

Siva

entry.title: RAP Fiori Elements deletes equals sign (=) from input field
entry.content:
Hello,
‚Ä¢ On a S/4HANA 2022 system, I created a simple test, to reproduce the error by creating a database table with

define table zz_so {
  key client : abap.clnt not null;
  key sales_order_no : zz_so_sales_order_no not null;
  key description : zz_so_description not null;

The Data Element ZZ_SO_SALES_ORDER_NO has a Domain with the same name with Data Type CHAR and length 2.

‚Ä¢ I generated a UI RAP service based on this DB table.
‚Ä¢ Press button Preview

‚Ä¢ Press button Create and fill =B

‚Ä¢ Press tab

‚Ä¢ Now you see that "=B" is changed to "B".

The reason for the equal sign is that the actual field wherefor it is needed, can contain values like =B, =b, 4k, ?a.

How to turn off this behavior?

entry.title: How to CAST a CHAR(12) field to CHAR(10) and use it in a JOIN inside Custom CDS Views S/4H CloudPubl
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I‚Äôm working in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition, and I need to create a join between the following fields:

  • I_PurchaseOrderAPI01.PurchaseOrder (type CHAR(10))

  • I_PurchaseOrderAPI01.CorrespncExternalReference (type CHAR(12))

The issue is that the CorrespncExternalReference field contains the Purchase Order number plus two additional characters.
For example:

450000123456 ‚Üí the real PO number is 4500001234

What I need to do is join both fields using only the first 10 characters of CorrespncExternalReference,
like this:

I_PurchaseOrderAPI01.PurchaseOrder = substring(I_PurchaseOrderAPI01.CorrespncExternalReference, 1, 10)

OR MAY

I_PurchaseOrderAPI01.PurchaseOrder = cast(I_PurchaseOrderAPI01.CorrespncExternalReference as ebeln/char10)

I want to achieve this inside a Custom CDS View, because I‚Äôll later consume it in an Analytical Cube and bring both the Supplier and SupplierName for each Purchase Order.

However, I ran into some limitations:

  • In the Custom CDS Views app, I can‚Äôt use string functions like substring() in the join condition.

  • I also can‚Äôt cast a CHAR(12) to CHAR(10) directly.

  • I tried creating a calculated field (CorrespncExternalReferenceTrim) and then using it in the join, but the system doesn‚Äôt allow calculated fields in joins.

  • I also tried creating a CDS view in Eclipse with this annotations:

@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Purchase Order'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
@ObjectModel.supportedCapabilities: [ #CDS_MODELING_DATA_SOURCE, #CDS_MODELING_ASSOCIATION_TARGET ]
//@ObjectModel.supportedCapabilities: #CDS_MODELING_ASSOCIATION_TARGET

but it doesn‚Äôt show up as a selectable data source inside Custom CDS Views. Only SAP standard views or those created directly within the app appears.

My questions are:

  1. Is there any way to perform this kind of join (substring or length-based) directly in Custom CDS Views?

  2. If not, what annotations should I add in Eclipse to make a custom CDS view visible as a data source inside Custom CDS Views?

  3. Are there specific restrictions in S/4HANA Cloud (Public Edition) that prevent using developer-created CDS views in Custom CDS Views?

Any example or best practice would be really appreciated üôè

Thanks in advance,

Luka!

entry.title: Parameter has invalid value: Parameter IV_VALUE has invalid value .
entry.content:
Hi All,

Below is my oData URL and when executing from /IWFND/GW_CLIENT

/sap/opu/odata4/sap/api_project_v3/srvd_a2x/sap/project/0001/WBSElement?sap-statistics=true&$top=2

I am getting the below response:
{
"error" : {
"code" : "CX_PARAMETER_INVALID_RANGE",
"message" : "Parameter has invalid value: Parameter IV_VALUE has invalid value .",
"@SAP__common.ExceptionCategory" : "Client_Error",
"details" : [
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_INTERNAL_ERROR/0050569259751EE4BA97133877F61116",
"message" : "In the context of Data Services an unknown internal server error occurred",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
},
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_EP_ENTITY_ERROR/0050569259751EE4BA9739C53C899155",
"message" : "Error occurred while processing property 'SchedldBasicEarliestStartDate' of entity with index 1",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
},
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_EP_PROPERTY_ERROR/005056A509B11ED1BF822D2D09173A04",
"message" : "Property 'SchedldBasicEarliestStartDate' has invalid value ''",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
}
],
"innererror" : {
"ErrorDetails" : {
"@SAP__common.Application" : {
"ComponentId" : "PS-ST",
"ServiceRepository" : "SRVD_A2X",
"ServiceId" : "API_PROJECT_V3",
"ServiceVersion" : "0001"
},
"@SAP__common.TransactionId" : "A2E9BF5D760A0070E0068F0DD38A7ACB",
"@SAP__common.Timestamp" : "20251016161510.514754",
"@SAP__common.ErrorResolution" : {
"Analysis" : "Use ADT feed reader \"SAP Gateway Error Log\" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details",
"Note" : "See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)"
}
}
}
}
}

Did anyone faced this error and please let me know how to resolve this error?

Thanks,

BK

entry.title: OData Services ABAP RESTful application programming model
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

 

I‚Äôm working on the S4D400 exercise where we create a subpackage  ZS4D400 and copy the table  /LRN/S4D400_APT to our own package.

However, I noticed that my main package S4D400 doesn‚Äôt exist in my ABAP environment.

Should I create this package manually, or is it supposed to be pre-delivered by the system?

I need some suggestions how to find that package. so that I can create the application.

Thanks in advance
Sumanth.

entry.title: clean core proxy isn't commited
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I try to code my first clean core application using application job. In this app I create some orders. Therefore I made a proxy for BAPI_PO_CREATE1 (note 3496669). But for some reasons the bapi isn't commited by the framework (Fuba is called with destination none). Neither application job nor rap object create my order. The only thing that works is when I program a BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT into the proxy. But that can't be right, can it? What do you think?

Thanks and regards
Bernd

entry.title: Display PDF document as RAP Odata V4 Web API output
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am trying to implement a requirement, in which I have to get the archived PDF documents (For Example : Delivery Notes attachment, Notification attachments) and display it as PDF Output to user via RAP OData V4 Web API. I tried to implement it with custom entity with corresponding logic in ABAP class using if_rap_query_provider~select and assigned Large Objects annotation to the stream data. However, I am getting error "The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request", when I add $value at the end of uri to display the document as shown in attachment bruno_return_2.jpg. 

Please help to get this resolved. 

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: IF_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER~SELECT called two times causing issues
entry.content:
I built an RAP application with Header and Item using Custom Entities as I need to call external API for fetching the data.

The Select Query is called twice, once with Offset 0 and second with Offset 34. Upon Execution for the first time I have all the data fetched and I am setting the Number of Records Fetched and data. However, since the query is called twice, with offset greater than number of records, the select query is failing and throwing an error message.

Please help on how to prevent the error message

Below is my code

  METHOD if_rap_query_provider~select.
** Check if data is requested.
    DATA(lv_requested) = io_request->is_data_requested( ).
    IF lv_requested IS NOT INITIAL.
      DATA(lv_entity_id) = io_request->get_entity_id( ).
      CASE lv_entity_id.
** get the bank balance
        WHEN 'YYYYYYY'.
          get_YYYYYYY(
            EXPORTING
              io_request  = io_request
              io_response = io_response
          ).
** Get the Bank statement
        WHEN 'XXXXXXX'.
          get_XXXXXXX(
            EXPORTING
              io_request  = io_request
              io_response = io_response
          ).
        WHEN OTHERS.
      ENDCASE.
    ENDIF.
  ENDMETHOD.

**********  Entity Method logic
  METHOD get_YYYYYY.
**paging
    DATA(lv_offset) = io_request->get_paging( )->get_offset( ).
    DATA(lv_page_size) = io_request->get_paging( )->get_page_size( ).
    DATA(lv_max_rows) = COND #( WHEN lv_page_size = if_rap_query_paging=>page_size_unlimited
                                THEN 0 ELSE lv_page_size ).

** Get the search criteria
    DATA(lv_sql_filter) = io_request->get_filter( )->get_as_sql_string( ).

**search string
    DATA(lv_search_string) = io_request->get_search_expression( ).

    SELECT ******<Logic>
      INTO TABLE _Itab
      UP TO _max_rows ROWS OFFSET _offset ##TOO_MANY_ITAB_FIELDS.
    IF sy-subrc NE 0.
      ls_message-msgid = gc_msgid.
      ls_message-msgno = '042'.
* No Data found for the given criteria
    ENDIF.

    IF ls_message IS NOT INITIAL.
      RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zcx_exception
        EXPORTING
          textid = ls_message.
    ENDIF.

    IF io_request->is_total_numb_of_rec_requested( ).
      io_response->set_total_number_of_records( lines( lt_itab ) ).
    ENDIF.

    io_response->set_data( lt_itab ).

  ENDMETHOD.

Service Definition

entry.title: RAP I_SalesOrderTP lock error on Update
entry.content:
Hello,

in a RAP behavior determination I'm trying to modify the scheduling line of an sales order item:

MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_salesordertp

    ENTITY SalesOrderScheduleLine

      UPDATE FROM VALUE #( for k in dlv(

         SalesOrder = k-SalesOrder

        SalesOrderItem = k-SalesOrderItem

      SchedulineLine   = k-SalesOrderSchedLIne

     RequestedDeliveryDate = k-DeliveryDate

   %control-RequestedDeliveryDate = if_abap_behv=>mk-on ))

    FAILED data(ls_failed)

For a single entry it works but if I have more than one entry in table dlv I got an an error in table ls_failed for each entry like the following:

I replicate the same code in an abap program ( SE38 ). I got the same problem. If I split the modifications using multiple modify statement and put a commit entities between each modify it works correctly.

Any suggestions ?
